description.text: You excel at crafting armor made from the hides of animals or monsters.

sections.Benefit: You gain a +4 bonus on Craft (armor) checks to create armor or shields from the hides of living creatures (such as dragonhide). If you succeed at a Craft (armor) check to create armor or shields from the hides of living creatures by 5 or more, you also decrease the cost to make the item by 10%.
